author: sharan

review: A little bit of false advertising on Google's part with regards to streaming from a smartphone.  The commercials make it look like you can stream anything from an iPhone but this is not the case.  The iPhone app only allows streaming of, wait for it, Netflix and YouTube.  Yay!  Yet another way to stream content to your TV from those two apps, just in case you don't have a Roku, Apple TV, Smart TV, Smart DVD player, or any one of the huge number of devices which already exist for these two services.I have an iMac and this does allow streaming of content from the Chrome browser.  For example, I'm able to stream foreign television which is kind of cool and I can watch Monday Night Football by streaming.I'm disappointed that I have to use an old fashioned computer to stream from a browser but hopefully Google will add the ability to stream from an iPhone or Android browser in the near future.
author: Neil bey

review: Installs easily,  works well love using my tablet or phone as my remote. Use HBO to go,  hulu and Netflix with no problems.  Streams videos from my desk top chrome browser no problem.  Have yet to stream a movie from the play store, but I imagine that'll work great too.Minus 1 star due to lack of apps,  but I understand that Google is releasing development tools now, so that should change soon.
